LiveGuru
A platform for one on one doubt solving

Amaan Ram

Age:14 yrs, New Era School Senior Secondary School, Vadodara, Gujarat. I am Programming since last 3 years. Creating websites since 1 year. I like to use firebase as database as a service for client side programming. I am learning new technologies like django and nodeJs for backend.

Live Guru is a one on one doubt solving Website. The website consists of two primary modes or roles of teacher and student. You can change the mode by clicking on the "teacher" or "student" button respectively. A student can add a doubt in the text box given and can also add an image so that people can understand your doubt better. The doubt will be uploaded in the teacher section. You can go in the teacher section and browse through all the doubts asked by different people. You inspect the doubts by image provided by the student. When you click on the "solve the doubt" button, you will be connected to the student live via video conferencing. The student can also share the screen if wanted.
